name: Rapid Care Visit - Virtual
description: Same day video visit for common concerns such as cough, sore throat, strains, rashes, uncomplicated urinary symptoms, or other short-lived issues. Receive quick clinical guidance and a focused treatment plan for recovery. This visit does not include ADHD management. For chest pain or trouble breathing, call 911.
cancellation_policy: Rapid care visits can be rescheduled or canceled up to 12 hours in advance without penalty.

name: General Medical Visit - Virtual
description: Comprehensive consultation with history, assessment, and a personalized care plan. Common topics include preventive care, chronic condition check-ins, and new concerns that benefit from a detailed exam history and follow-up guidance.
cancellation_policy: Please provide 24 hours notice to cancel or reschedule this visit.

name: ADHD Visit - Virtual
description: Diagnostic evaluation using DSM-5 criteria with an individualized treatment plan and behavioral coaching guidance. Designed for adults seeking evaluation or follow-up adjustments for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
cancellation_policy: ADHD evaluations may be moved or canceled with 24 hours notice.

name: ADHD Medication Refill - Virtual
description: Brief follow up for patients already stabilized on stimulant therapy. We review current symptoms, medication response, and confirm safety before renewing medication when clinically appropriate.
cancellation_policy: Medication management visits require 12 hours notice for changes.

name: Weight Loss Visit - Virtual
description: Personalized weight management consultation that reviews health history, medications, and current lifestyle goals. Leave with a clear plan that fits your lifestyle and preferences, including medication when clinically appropriate.
cancellation_policy: Weight loss visits can be rescheduled up to 24 hours beforehand.
